<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/typescript/02_simple/source.ts">

class UserModel:
    field public readonly id: number
    field private lastLogin: Date | null = null
    field public username: string
    field private email: string
    function constructor(id: number, username: string, email: string)
    function getProfileInfo()
    function recordLogin() -> void
    private function _validateEmail(email: string) -> void
    private function _generateProfileUrl() -> string
</file>
